properties.title: Summit Bechtel Reserve
properties.description: Premium MTB — ~30-40 mi trail, green to double black. Private BSA facility. ⚠️ MUST call (304) 465-2800 or check summitbsa.org — public access NOT guaranteed. Likely $5-20/day [UNVERIFIED].

properties.title: Summit Bechtel Parking / Entrance
properties.description: 2550 Jack Furst Dr, Glen Jean, WV 25846. Waiver required at entrance. [UNVERIFIED]
